description:
Established in 1991 in Murrells Inlet, South Carolina, the Law Office of David L Hood has an additional office in Myrtle Beach as well as 10 other locations across the state, providing convenient access to unmatched advocacy and support to plaintiff clients adversely affected by someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.

Regarded as one of South Carolina's premier personal injury practices, the firm has achieved unprecedented success fighting for the rights and entitlements of individuals and families who have suffered injuries or lost loved ones as the result of a motor vehicle accident, medical malpractice, a defective product or medical device, mesothelioma or some other preventable tragedy.

Founded by top-rated, award-winning trial lawyer David L. Hood, the law firm has more than 25 years of serving the residents of South Carolina who have suffered needlessly through no fault of their own. Along with handling all types of personal injury and wrongful death claims, the team also can assist you with obtaining your rightful Social Security Disability benefits, and it has recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for its plaintiff clients.

In recognition for his exemplary professionalism, outstanding legal abilities and unwavering commitment to his clients, Mr. Hood is Notable peer-review rated* through Martindale-Hubbell and has also earned the organization's Gold Client Champion award. Moreover, the firm's team has enjoyed numerous testimonials and referrals from its satisfied clients and finds great reward in being able to help so many in their most dire times of need.

To schedule a free initial consultation concerning your matter, you can contact the Law Office of David L Hood to set up an appointment. The firm also offers virtual consultations in today's uncertain environment to help keep you and your family safe.

*AV速, AV Preeminent速, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell速 is the facilitator of a peer-review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell速 Peer Review RatingsTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
